Articles.Content: Hello, I have been watching quite a lot of videos of KSP lately and bought yesterday on Steam. I also have a question: Does an atmospheric burn-up effect your ship with a Kerbal or solar panel hanging on it's side? If you could answer that, great. Well, I hope to be part of the team!

Hi Hades51, welcome to the forums

The re-entry heat effect won't harm your Kerbal or you panels, but the air flow over them will rip the solar panels to shreds and can easily pull your Kerbal off the side of your rocket!
The only danger from apnospheric rentry is losing your solar panels and kerbals getting ripped off. Welcome to the forums!
